attributes.action: Bank holiday For Uk when we win the euros
attributes.additional_details: For the good of the British people. It is what Boris wants.
attributes.background:
We all know it is most likely coming home. As such we feel it is wise to celebrate such a football victory with a yearly bank holiday. 

It would be an added benefit if everyone got free ski passes countrywide too. Although not essential. The coming home and bank holiday is essential.
